title: Research beads JSONL schema
notes:
2026-01-10 11:58 - Beads stores issues in .beads/issues.jsonl (one JSON object per line). Key fields to map: id, title, description, status, priority, type, labels, parent, blocked_by. Filter out closed issues during import.
2026-01-10 12:02 - BEADS SCHEMA RESEARCH COMPLETE:

Field Mapping (beads → ticks):
- ID → ID (generate new, build remap table)
- Title → Title
- Description → Description  
- Notes → Notes
- Status → Status (map: blocked/deferred→open, closed/tombstone→skip)
- Priority → Priority (both 0-4)
- IssueType → Type (bug/feature/task/epic/chore→same, others→task)
- Assignee → Owner
- Labels → Labels
- CreatedAt → CreatedAt (preserve)
- CreatedBy → CreatedBy
- UpdatedAt → UpdatedAt (preserve)
- ClosedAt → ClosedAt
- CloseReason → ClosedReason

Dependency Mapping:
- Dependencies[type=parent-child].DependsOnID → Parent
- Dependencies[type=blocks].DependsOnID → BlockedBy[]
- Dependencies[type=discovered-from].DependsOnID → DiscoveredFrom

Skip import if:
- Status is closed or tombstone
- DeletedAt is not nil
closed_reason: Schema research complete - full field mapping documented
